title: Artist-Branded Cannabis Strain
subtitle: MJBizCon 2026 Launch Proposal

summary.title: 1. Executive Summary
summary.content: This project proposes a strategic collaboration between cannabis breeder Bryan Rousey and hip hop artist Jayy Wick to develop, produce, launch, and commercialize an exclusive artist-branded cannabis strain - timed with MJBizCon 2026 (December 1-4 in Las Vegas).
summary.content2: The strain will align with Jayy Wick's creative identity and launch alongside music releases, live events, and merchandise.

highlight.title: Why This Matters
points: Aligns Jayy Wick's cultural brand with cannabis industry exposure
Uses MJBizCon - the largest cannabis trade convention - as a launch platform
Builds ongoing revenue through licensed flower runs, dispensary distribution, and artist-directed sales
Invests in professional cultivation infrastructure and proprietary genetics

snapshot.title: Artist Snapshot
points: Hip-hop artist with recent single Pork Chop Sammich
Hip-hop/rap genre with growing social media presence
Active on Apple Music and streaming platforms

value.title: Value to Cannabis Brand
points: Authentic cultural relevance where cannabis intersects hip-hop fans
Active content creation potential for promotion
Growing identity that benefits from lifestyle branding synergy

productDev.title: A. Product Development
points: Brand Strain Name: Co-developed with Jayy Wick
Genetics: Custom-bred phenotype targeting exceptional terpene profile
Final Strain Selection: 6 months breeding + phenotype hunt
Commercial Production: Two full flower runs before launch

brandIntegration.title: B. Brand Integration
points: Packaging & Artwork: Original design reflecting Jayy Wick's music/imagery
Marketing Collateral: Digital, print, lifestyle photos, video assets
Seasonal Drops: Coordinated with music releases or tour dates

distribution.title: C. Distribution & Sales
points: Dispensary Presence: Las Vegas / Nevada dispensaries
Tour Merch + Cannabis Bundles: Optional artist tours
Online & Direct Sales: Compliant NFT/collector editions (if applicable)

financial.title: 5. Financial Overview
financial.note: Capital needed upfront with staged draw based on milestone delivery.

location.title: Location
location.content: Facility located just outside Las Vegas - key for:
points: Logistical convenience for MJBizCon
Nevada cannabis compliance
Transportation to regional dispensaries

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.content: We'll coordinate with local licensed partners and ensure all product packaging and testing meets Nevada state requirements.

brandIdentity.title: Brand Identity
points: Artist visuals + cannabis identity converge
High-quality photo/video shoot with Jayy Wick
Release at event + streaming platform cross-promo

preLaunch.title: Pre-Launch Awareness
points: Teaser campaigns on social media
Limited pre-order run
Influencer integrations

launchEvents.title: Launch Events
points: MJBizCon booth experience
Pop-up launch party
Special edition merchandise

postLaunch.title: Post-Launch
points: Seasonal drops tied to music releases
Tour integrations
Bundle packages

revenueSplit.title: Revenue Split
revenueSplit.content: Negotiated percentage for artist / cultivation team / investor(s). Typical structures include:
points: Artist royalty % on wholesale
Brand share of special product tiers
Performance bonus metrics

deliverables.title: Deliverables
points: Timelines and milestones for product creation
Branding & co-ownership clauses
Rights for artist to use product in promotions
Exclusivity region & channels

points.title: Cultural Relevance
points.desc: Hip hop + cannabis = enduring market synergy

points.title: Revenue Diversity
points.desc: Wholesale, retail, direct sales, tour merchandise

points.title: Unique IP
points.desc: Proprietary strain tied to artist name

finalNote.title: The Opportunity
finalNote.content: This project isn't just about a product - it's a lifestyle brand launch with music, cannabis culture, and ongoing monetization opportunities. If positioned right, this could become one of the most talked-about artist collaborations in the cannabis space for 2026.

footer: Confidential Business Proposal - For intended recipients only
